entry.title: Surprisingly, Tail Emission Is Not Inflationary
entry.summary: The article delves into the issue of a fixed block reward and its impact on the supply of Bitcoin. The author uses modeling to demonstrate that lost coins result in a stable monetary supply, with neither inflationary nor deflationary conditions. The feasibility of adding tail emission to Bitcoin is also discussed, but it would require convincing the Bitcoin community of its benefits for implementation.The Bitcoin Developer Mailing List, hosted by the Linux Foundation, is an online forum for developers working on the Bitcoin network to discuss issues related to the development of the system. Its mission is to promote the use and growth of open source technologies.In summary, the Bitcoin Developer Mailing List is an essential resource for developers looking to contribute to the ongoing development of the Bitcoin network. The foundation's support for open source software development is an important contribution to the growth and sustainability of the Bitcoin network and other open source projects.
